PointerEventTiltX.summary:
The tiltX read-only property of the
interface is the angle (in degrees) between the Y-Z
plane of the pointer and the screen. This property is typically only useful for a
pen/stylus pointer type.

remarks.para: For an illustration of this property see Figure 2 in the specification.

PointerEventTiltX.value: The angle in degrees between the Y-Z plane of the pointer (stylus) and the screen. The range of values is -90 to 90, inclusive, where a positive value is a tilt to the right. For devices that do not support this property, the value is 0.
